the `params` option creates a read-only list named "params".

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
params

mpg

class <- mpg |> filter(class == params$my_class)
```

# Fuel economy for `r params$my_class`s

```{r}
#| message: false

ggplot(class, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)
```
